results.title: [Diurnal profile of arterial pressure during sleep deprivation in patients with hypertensive disease receiving antihypertensive therapy].
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@Sleep deprivation@@@ resulted in the inverted AP profile (mean night-time AP higher than the mean daytime value) whether the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were treated with long-acting @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or with short-acting @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ given immediately before @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@sleep deprivation@@@.

citations.NLM: Tsfasman AZ, Alpaev DV, Karetskaia TD. [Diurnal profile of arterial pressure during sleep deprivation in patients with hypertensive disease receiving antihypertensive therapy]. Klin Med (Mosk). 2012;90(7):34-7. PMID: 23019972
